title: Class Likelihood Ratios to Measure Classification Performance
description: In this lab, we will use scikit-learn to demonstrate how to compute the positive and negative likelihood ratios (LR+, LR-) to assess the predictive power of a binary classifier. These metrics are independent of the proportion between classes in the test set, which makes them very useful when the available data for a study has a different class proportion than the target application.
